archimate:Node.name: [SBB] UMAN identity token management
archimate:Node.documentation:
DUO één type token - Vasco - dat in diverse systemen wordt beheerd: - Uman Identity Token - Vasco Authentication Server Het token wordt ook wel digipass of token genoemd.
The minimum prerequisites for the U-Man Console Application are: • JAVA Runtime 1.4.2: installed and in the SYSTEM PATH. • IBM GSKit • IBM LDAP client • Vasco Vacman Controller 3.5.0: installed and in the SYSTEM PATH. • An updated LDAP schema (see 1.2 Updating the LDAP server).
